price: Dan ceritakanlah (hai Muhammad kepada mereka), kisah Musa di dalam Alkitab (Al-Qur`ān) ini. Sesungguhnya ia adalah seorang yang dipilih dan seorang rasul dan nabi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
